## SlideCollection.AddEmptySlide method

Adds a new empty slide to the end of the collection.

```csharp
public ISlide AddEmptySlide(ILayoutSlide layout)
```

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| layout | ILayoutSlide | Layout for a slide. |

### Return Value

Added slide.
